headline: Boeing Stock Rises as Wait Drags on for Fatal 787 Air India Crash Update. What We Know.
summary: Boeing  stock rose Monday even as investors wait for details from flight data recorders on board Air India flight 171, which crashed on June 12, less than a minute after taking off from an airport in Ahmedabad.  Through Monday trading, it was up about 2% since the Air India crash, and shares of  GE Aerospace  were up about 1% as well.  The company’s GEnx engines powered the Air India plane.

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Hexcel’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Hexcel’s first quarter results for 2025 fell short of Wall Street expectations, with management attributing the shortfall mainly to weaker-than-anticipated demand from commercial aerospace customers, especially Airbus and Boeing. headline: Boeing Stock Inches Down as Wait Drags on for Fatal 787 Air India Crash Update. What We Know.
summary: Boeing  stock slipped Monday as investors wait for details from flight data recorders on board Air India flight 171, which crashed on June 12, less than a minute after taking off from an airport in Ahmedabad.  Coming into Monday trading, it was up about 1% since the Air India crash and shares of  GE Aerospace  were up about 1% as well.  GEnx engines powered the Air India plane.

headline: BAE Systems and Defense Unicorns selected to provide scalable secure software delivery solution for the U.S. Department of Defense's Platform One Solutions Marketplace
summary: BAE Systems (LON: BA), a leading provider of defense systems integration and advanced DevSecOps services, in collaboration with Defense Unicorns, a pioneer in secure software delivery platforms today announced that their joint solution has achieved "Awardable" status through the Platform One (P1) Solutions Marketplace.
